§ 4010. Acquisition of additional land The Attorney General may, when authorized by law, acquire land adjacent to or in the vicinity of a Federal penal or correctional institution if he considers the additional land essential to the protection of the health or safety of the inmates of the institution. (Added Pub. L. 89–554, § 3(f), Sept. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 610.)
